quote: The harder he clung to an outcome, the further he pushed success away.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the paradox of attachment and its impact on success.
suggested_hook: Are you pushing success away by holding on too tight?

quote: When you can really refresh and learn to fall in love with your process again, that's your edge.
why_clipworthy: Encourages a shift in perspective from outcome to process.
suggested_hook: Rediscover the power of loving your process.
